gate.compound
Interface CompoundDocument

All Superinterfaces:
Comparable, Document, FeatureBearer, LanguageResource, NameBearer, Resource, Serializable, SimpleDocument, TextualDocument
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCompoundDocument, CompoundDocumentFromXml, CompoundDocumentImpl
public interface CompoundDocument
extends TextualDocument

Compound document is a collection of individual documents. When it is created, it doesn't contain any composite document but one can create it by using the combine PR.

Author:
niraj

getAlignmentInformation

Alignment getAlignmentInformation(String alignmentFeatureName)
The alignment object contains information about the alignment of text. If the alignment with given name doesn't exist, this method creates an empty alignment object and returns it.

Returns:
